snippet.title: Einar - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The inhabitants of a Norse fishing village have been infected by a mysterious material. Take on the role of Einar and kill them all.

THE GAME IS FREE TO PLAY AND WILL LAUNCH ON STEAM WITHIN THE NEXT FEW DAYS!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/674400/Einar/


About:
Einar is a game developed by a group of students of the NHTV University of Applied Sciences in Breda, the Netherlands. During the course of one academic year, a group of developing artists, programmers and designers worked on the game with a single vision: making a short but beautiful and engaging game of AAA-quality.
